meanings.definition: To use capital letters in writing.
meanings.sent1: She always capitalizes the first letter of her name.
meanings.sent2: In formal writing, it is important to capitalize proper nouns.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reminded the students to capitalize the beginning of each sentence.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting capitalizes every 'I' and 'J', making them stand out.
meanings.sent5: The headline capitalizes the main words to grab attention.

meanings.definition: To take advantage of a situation for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: He capitalizes on his friend's absence to eat the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: Some companies capitalize on holidays to boost sales.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox capitalizes on the distraction to steal the cheese.
meanings.sent4: The politician capitalizes on the public's fear to gain votes.
meanings.sent5: The savvy investor capitalizes on market fluctuations to make a profit.
